jcr:content.awardContent1: 102 state Honorees receive $1,000, engraved silver medallion and all expense trip with parent/guardian to Washington DC for national recognition events. Ten national Honorees receive $5,000, engraved gold medallion, crystal trophies.
jcr:content.awardReq1: Girl Scout in middle or high school Conducted a volunteer service activity Application certified by local Girl Scout council
